title: The Co-operative Society shall be responsible for maintenance of facilities provided within the area leased to the society
clause_text: The Co-operative Society shall be responsible for maintenance of facilities provided within the area leased to the society. The maintenance shall involve sweeping and cleaning of pathways, collection of household garbage and carrying it to the nearest municipal dustbin, maintenance and replacement of common conveniences, etc. The Co-operative Housing Society shall be entitled to levy a suitable service charge on its members for this purpose.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
